Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Armpit \Arm"pit`\, n. [Arm + pit.] The hollow beneath the junction of the arm and shoulder; the axilla. [1913 Webster]
armpit n : the hollow under the arm where it is joined to the shoulder; "they were up to their armpits in water" [syn: {axilla}, {axillary cavity}, {axillary fossa}]
